issue.title: taptap.cn (幻塔 APP)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

.

issue.title: m.youtube.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=24dfe8q7Aq4](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3D24dfe8q7Aq4) ### Comment > YouTube videos commonly begin playing some seconds after video start, i.e. not from 0:00 on video timeline, but several seconds later (e.g. from 0:05-0:15), especially in popular videos that have many ads. The issue occurs systematically with AdGuard app for Android, but rarely with browser extension. It affects all major browsers, including Chromium-based as well. ``` Username: @DimitrisKalaboukas ``` ### Screenshots
